title: The Undefeated's Marc Spears
description:
The Undefeated and ESPN's Marc Spears on the dynamic of the LeBron James and Kobe Bryant relationship, his new book, "The Spencer Haywood Rule," NBA hiring practices of minority candidates and much more. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
